title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content:
Cover image: Maremma sheepdog (Canis familiaris) guarding sheep (Ovis aries) from dingoes, foxes and other predators on a property in north-eastern Victoria, Australia. Livestock guardian dogs can facilitate the co-existence of wild predators and livestock, and are often invaluable for livestock producers by keeping livestock safe from predator attacks.

Photo by: Linda Van Bommel
siteTitle: Wiley: Ecological Solutions and Evidence: Table of Contents
